#summary How to write your own spec generation implementations

= Introduction =

If you do not like any of the built-in spec generators, this page will show you how to write your own.


= Details =

== 1. Writing the generator ==

Implement the org.accept4j.specification.generator.SpecGenerator interface. For an example, check out the code at [http://code.google.com/p/accept4j/source/browse/trunk/ext/Accept4JExtension/src/org/accept4j/ext/specification/generator/text/TextSpecGenerator.groovy]
